"PSE/PSE Bursts":
"PSE stands for \"Photon Sensitive Effect\"

Defeating enemies and completing Trials will fill the area's PSE Gauge. When the PSE Gauge fills completely, a large number of enemies, including Rare Enemies, will appear, giving you a chance to earn a lot of EXP and items."

"When you clear a Trial when the PSE Gauge is at Level 4, a PSE Burst occurs.

During a PSE Burst, a huge number of enemies, Rare Enemies and boss enemies will appear, giving you a chance to earn more EXP and items than usual.

※The Gauge resets to 0 when nobody is in the Section."

"The PSE Gauge can be filled in the following ways:

・Working with other players to defeat a lot of enemies very quickly
・Defeating enemies at locations marked with E-Markers
・Clearing Trials at locations marked with T-Markers

A PSE Burst will occur when you successfully clear a Trial while the PSE Gauge is at Level 4."
"In addition, during certain weather conditions, the PSE Gauge will not drop below Level 4, making PSE Bursts easier to attain."
